Activity: The President received a wake up call from the White House signal board operator.
The President went to the Oval Office.
The President received a message via the White House operator from his Assistant, JamesR. Schlesinger.
The President met with his Assistant for National Security Affairs, Zbiqniew Brzezinski.
The President went to the State Dining Room.
The President hosted a breakfast meeting for Democratic Congressional leaders.  For a list of attendees, see. APPENDIX"A."
The President received breakfast guests.
The Presidential party went to the first floor Private Dining Room.
The Presidential party had breakfast.
The First Lady greeted the President's breakfast guests.
The President returned to the Ova1 Office.
The President met with his Assistant, Hamilton Jordan.
The President met with Mr. Brzezinski.
The President met with his Press Secretary, Jody Powell.
The President went to the Cabinet Room.

The President participated in a swearing-in ceremony for Joseph A. Califano, Jr. to be Secretary Health, Education and Welfare (HEw'). The oath of office was administered. by Associate Justice of the U.S. Supreme Court William J. Brennan, Jr. For a list of attendees, see ApPENDIx "B.". Members of the press
The President addressed guests attending the ceremony.
The President returned to the Ova1 Office.
